remarks: The property " ` F ` is a section of ` G ` ".  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
issect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
issect.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
issect.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
issect.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
issect.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
issect.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
issect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
issect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
issect $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X S Y ) G <-> ( F e. ( X H Y ) /\ G e. ( Y H X ) /\ ( G ( <. X , Y >. .x. X ) F ) = ( .1. ` X ) ) ) ) $.
